channel.title: smddzcy | yet another dev
channel.description: yet another dev. software engineer, web enthusiast. shares articles, tutorials and his thoughts on various things.

item.title: "Hello, World"
item.content:encoded:
"Hello, World". When a programmer starts learning a new language, it’s the 2 magical words that must be printed on the screen. I think I have used these words more than I should, I have to stop somewhere but anyways, here is my start.

This blog will be all about programming, tech, and some other mumbo-jumbo. Here I’ll be sharing some of my works, tips & tricks, tutorials.

I don’t tweet a lot these days, but if you want to talk, click this shiny little twitter link: @smddzcy. You can also send me an e-mail at; samedduzcay @t gmail d0t com. No spam.

I’ll be back soon with other posts.
